title: BARD - You Can't Even Lie To Congress
itunes:title: BARD - You Can't Even Lie To Congress
description:
Mark and Gary link up on Sunday morning to discuss some of the weekend's developments and the charges filed (and not) surrounding various people's decisions to refuse to testify before the January 6th committee. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
